review:
* This review is after 10 days of regular usage from the date of delivery.  
* Packaging : Nice and strong - Not too big, nor too small. Great job there, Amazon!  
* Delivery : One Day Delivery (Without Prime) - Prompt Delivery, Delivery Associate was courteous enough and well behaved. Awesome as always, Amazon!  
* Inside the Box : Charger (5V,2A) + Micro USB Cable + Phone + Sim Ejector Pin + Soft TPU Transparent Case + Warranty Cards and Quick Start Guide  
* Camera : 8/10  
* Build Quality : 9.5/10  
* Battery (For Regular Usage) : 9/10  
* UI Experience : 8/10  
* Call Clarity : 9/10  
* No lag whatsoever in the past 10 days.  
* Gives a solid and sturdy feel.  
* 5.9 inch LTPS IPS LCD display - 2160 x 1080 px - 18:9 aspect ratio. Option for full screen mode on third party applications.  
* 4GB of RAM – 64 GB variant – Phone color: Black.  
* Rear Camera: Dual camera setup – One with 16MP senor while the other one is a 2MP depth sensor. Has PDAF and records 1080P videos at 30fps. Single LED flash.  
* Front Camera: 8MP camera which also records 1080P videos.  
* Battery: 3340mAh – For low and medium users, the phone will last for a full working day.  
* SIM – Hybrid SIM Slot – Both SIMs support 4G VOLTE. No cellular signal discrepancies whatsover.

It's been one month since i bought this phone. I really wanted to brake some
myth revolving around this phone.  
1 Low light photography : First of all for this budget honor has provided a
very good camera . Some people who feel that the phone is dull in low light
should change their settings and its a gem.  
2\. Not good for gaming: Honor 7x comes with Mali Gpu which is old but not a
bad one and they often compare with Adreno Gpu . Of course, Adreno is powerful
but Mali is only slightly below par . Reviewers often play Alsphalt Airbone 8
to compare gaming performance which has lot of graphics and eats a RAM. At one
point any budget phone in the market will definitely have some nags when you
play such a high quality game.  
3\. Phone is not corning gorilla : Come on guys 2.5 D glass is same as corning
gorilla which protects your screen from scratch and breakage.  
Pros :  
1 . Extraordinary camera  
2\. Elegant screen display  
3\. Beautiful Design  
4\. Classy blue color  
5\. Smooth EMUI 5.1(Waiting for face unlock in next update EMUI 8.0 Oreo)  
5\. Powerful performance  
6\. Duplicating apps.  
7\. Honor cloud storage  
8\. 3400mAH battery.  
  
Cons :  
1 .Only cons is no fast charging.  
Overall you can go it if you are looking for a long lasting, stylish, budget
easy, better build and full screen display!

The phone is amazing. As some users said the flickering screen i too have
faced it for one time. Thats what made me dissappoint but with an software
update it went away.  
The camera is good but rear potrait mode, dual camera are nof satisfactory.
Overall i liked the phone. The battery back is okk eith me.

Decent look with display but camera out put not ok as mentioned by Honor. Well

I would definitely recommend this phone if your budget is 15k. It's amazing
for that prize.  
The problems with this phone are  
Charging takes a lot of time  
OK battery life  
Dual camera but could be done better  
YouTube app GLITCH which got fixed with the software upgrade.  
Thats all,don't worry if u have 15k then buy this phone this is definitely the
compared to vivo which is providing outdated stuff for 22k. Lol.

Honor in particular are not fit for market competition. They lack a basic
function: vifeocall through native dialer.  
How come they are preapred for Indian market full with Reliance Jio customers!

review:
Thanks Amazon and team for timely delivery with magnificent product.. Honor 7X
is cool phone... But again you have some pros and cons which are,  
PROS,  
1.Big and beautiful screen.  
2.stylish look with metallic body.  
3.call clarity pretty good.  
4.battery backup acceptable.  
5\. Price range very much affordable.  
  
CONS,  
1.front and back camera very disappointing.  
2\. Touch on screen somewhat late responsive.  
3.Hydrid sim card slot limits to either 2sim or single sim and SD Card.

Using mobile from last 45 days before Writing this review Worthy mobile for
this amount. Good camera quality,Decent battery backup, no hanging issue while
playing game. Overall good mobile to buy at this price.

The phone is pretty good as compared to the price.  
The camera is also pretty good and the phone works pretty fast for this price.  
The looks and finish of the phone is pretty good and gives a premium look.

Fast charging would have been cherry on the cake.  
  
Nevertheless, Battery backup is decent enough for moderate or heavy users.
Additionally, this can put on charging on 9pm with 40 juice left on Charing
for approx 1hr 45 min to get fully charged.

Cons  
Outdated ui  
Heating problem for continuous usage of 30min for calls  
my phone got hanged twice for the usage of 30 days.  
Average rear camera performance  
Battery drains fast. ( with Jio 4G Network it drain in 10 Hours)  
Slow charging  
rear camera projected outside. we have to use back cover to protect the same.  
  
Pros  
Looks very stylish  
Lighting fast fingerprint sensor  
Front camera is superb  
Screen is good  
Processor is average. ( hangs for heavy usage)

It feels like very luxurious/costly phone. Best for me. Battery saving is
amazing like only 3-4% consuming in hole day with ultra battery saving mode.  
Picture quality best but its ZOOM action is not equal to 10.or phone. But in
low light it gives very clear scan/photo. For Document scan or Computer screen
scan it is best.  
  
Gorrilla glass missing.  
  
Govind Singh

I am very satisfied with Honor 7X. I just moved from Redmi Note 3 to Honor 7X.
The phone is light weight, beautiful screen display, processor fast enough for
commonly used apps. Camera I have not tested enough.

I loved the phone. Its display is very good and battery is also enough for me.
Once fully charged it lasts for a day with heavy video streaming and internet
usage. The most important thing that I loved in this phone is themes. Every
morning i change my theme and its like a new and exciting experience for me. I
loved the phone. Camera is also good. It has pre installed apps like pitu with
basic version for advanced version i installed pitu and its great too. Soooo
happy with the phone. Highly recommend it to everyone.

It's a real charm, very well built phone, looks nice and performs well too.
Camera is way better than the mi phones but don't buy this one if you are
looking for portrait mode then go with mi a1.  
I purchased 32 GB variant, though I wish to buy 64 GB variant but 3k hike
didn't allowed to me to.

Very slow UI, only camera quality is fine, rest of the things, i.e. Everything
is not upto the mark... Don't waste money on this... I have used Honor 6 in
past that's why I bought 7x but hugey disappointed.

review:
After 2 weeks of intense usage i am writing this review..  
First of all the display is fantastic if you take ur honor 7x in public
definitely someone will ask what is the mobile.. it has a good PPI density..  
Back camera is above good (not best).. front camera at its best (pros).. and
processor speed and ram were absolutely brilliant u can be fast as lightning
with this mobile.. sound is good (pros)  
it takes about 2 and half hours to charge full (cons) Battery doesn't stay
much when using internet (cons)...  
  
And that's all it is a good phone for a regular user but when u came to a
concept of intense usage it will definitely betray u...

Amazing.....!!!!! The only word to explain it...  
Superb speed in each aspects...  
Had some doubt about charging speed as it has a 5v/2A charger but now fully
satisfied with the charging speed (in just 35 minutes from 37% to 99%) ;but
just missing a front flash.....

For 13k it's a beast..  
Full HD display.  
With 5.93 inches display it's perfect..  
Though it have some cons by its kk.  
What u need more in 13k..  
Amazon rocks..

Buy this if cameras aren't your highest priority else buy mi a1. So far i am
very happy with honor 7x  
Pros-  
1-Display  
2-performance  
3-rear and front cameras(rear-mi a1, front honor7x) . Sometimes portrait mode
looks artificial so i hope honor gives an ota update to improve portrait mode.  
4-battery life(not as good as redmi note 4 but gets me through the day with
normal or moderate usage)  
5-design(comes down to personal preference)  
  
Cons!  
1-no gyroscope sensor. I don't use vr so i don't have any problems with that  
2-doesn't support wifi @5ghz or wifi ac. Still i have no problems since i have
jio .  
Small features i like in honor 7x  
1- it has iPhone Ike spotlight search which comes in very handy when u have a
lot of apps installed  
2- using fingerprint sensor u can pull down notification panel which could be
very useful since 7x has 5.9" inch screen  
  
Overall a great phone at 13k

If you are looking for a budget phone with good bokeh effect , then you can go
for it. In Rs12,999 Redmi A1 can provide you the bokeh but its bokeh is not
good as this phone. I will recommend honor 7x. Have been using this from 1st
Jan, till no issue.

Used it for 3 weeks till now i have not faced any lagging, battery problem or

range

Great looks, build quality and finish. Battery last for well over a day even
with moderate usage. Camera is excellent in day light however low light photos
quality in auto mode is not that great. The edge to edge display quality is
excellent, be it for watching 1080p videos or for scrolling through the camera
roll. Overall, it's a great package and a lot of stuff for what you pay.

It's a Best buy phone at this price segment...more value for money than honor
9lite..

And I heard the face unlock feature coming very soon...

review:
Nice phone but,  
I found 4 cons:  
1) there should be separate slot for sim & memory card,  
2) camera could be much better,  
3) no fast charging,  
4) speaker charity is nice on call but when it comes to music performance it
is not so good. Sometimes I can't feel the beat as clearly as it should be so,
many times I heard mixture of two different beats.  
But thank God, There is no prob with 3:5 mm audio Jack it gives proper output.  
  
Otherwise phone is good. But, if you are planning to buy a now phone then I
would like to suggest mi note 5 pro.

My experience with the phone has been great up to now. I have been using the
phone for more than a month now without any heating or hanging issues at all.
The display is too good with decent sound quality. The Honor UI is also very
user friendly and has many user friendly features to make your phone usage
experience a delight. I hope this phone would stay the same for at least 2
years. All in all great product from HONOR.

review:
After using this mobile - Pros:  
Camera - Both front & rear are impressive!!  
Battery - Fast charging is not available but battery stands by more than a
day!  
Interface - EMUI steals the show  
Display - Besel less display is awesome  
Memory - RAM is good & ROM is adequate  
Cool metal body (I own 64GB Blue variant)  
Fingerprint sensor works great!  
No heating issues.  
  
Cons:  
64GB (Rs.15999) variant is quite high compared to 32GB (Rs.12999)  
  
Overall you can go for it!!

general users.

An excellent phone with a full value for money. The screen is awesome and the
camera quality is also good. Sound quality is also very decent. There is a
very little lag in spite of multiple apps being opened simultaneously.  
Only con is  
The firmware eats away almost 10gb of your total space of 32 GB. Now I uses 2
Sims so , the sim slot being hybrid with memory card, I will be struggling
with space.  
Otherwise a very good phone. Go for it.

Usage experince only from last 1 week.  
1.The mobile SIM card tray is not convenient to operate using pin tool.  
2\. The tray is very flimsy & may brake at any time.  
3\. Cannot load 2 Sims & memory card like other mobiles.  
4\. can load 1 SIM & memory card or 2 Sims a limitations.  
5\. The photographs from this large sized camera is not much clarity compare
to smaller cameras of any other mobiles.  
Further benefits & limitations will be known only after regular usage & can
report in my next mail.

Very nyc phone in 13k price. Value for money  
The best part of this phone is its display and camera. 18:9 aspect ratio is
bang on and the phone has an amazing camera. Battery life is super cool. Phone
charges from 5-100%in 2hrs 10 mins approx. 4gb ram and the processor works
very smooth. Hoping to receive the emui version 8 and android oreo update
soon.  
Compared to other phones in this price range like MI A1, Moto G5s plus etc.
this is the best phone amongst all

Excellent ....Honor 7X ..Iam using this mobile from past 15 days...It's looks
stylish,touch also working very smoothly..battery backup coming easily 1 to 1
1/2 day...so there is no prob with charging..call quality also good....its
processing multiple apps in same time..there is no lag issue..  
But in some reviews i saw screen flickering issue while using youtube and
while watching some hd videos...But for me no problem ...may be they fixed
with latest patch recently i did update..  
Finally mobile was good..

Stylish looks and lightweight, smooth and fast processing speed, great camera
esp. the front camera, rich display and plenty of customize-able options! In
short, full paisa vasool!

The look and feel of this phone is really beautiful, you actually won't feel
the extra burden of a big screen phone. Display quality really good. Processor
is quite fast.  
Not really happy with the secondary rear camera, in normal mode it takes
really good pic, but if you select dual camera mode it won't give you a proper
DOF image output as its been done in software level and not in proper hardware
level.  
Lastly not good for long time usage as the battery is really not that big, can
run for around a day with moderate usage.

Have used it for 2 weeks so far all good...  
Camera is superb ...  
Display owsom....  
Touch response and finger print great...
